\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[15d65114cd86e5a66fbc91cf88864700]%mdk
$\Pr[D'(z) = 1] = \frac{1}{2} + p(n)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={73}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e56bcce50c2b511fdb1a42199a17e643]%mdk
$p(n)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={73}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[accf6909e563f917aeda80e3ad48946d]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={77}
\begin{aligned}
|\E[D'(U_2n)] - E[D'(PRG(U_n)]| &\approx |\frac{1}{2^n}(\frac{1}{2} + p(n)) + (1 - \frac{1}{2^n})(\frac{1}{2} + \epsilon) - \frac{1}{2} + p(n)| \\
&= |\frac{p(n) - \epsilon}{2^n} + \epsilon - p(n)| \\
&=|-p(n) + negl| \\
&\approx p(n)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[8943649f6be04889c1cecd58ee8f9af3]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={173}
\begin{aligned}
EVAL(x,s^*) &= G_{x_{n}}(G_{x_{n-1}}(\cdots G_{x_{k+1}}(s_k))) \\
&= G_{x_{n}}(G_{x_{n-1}}(\cdots G_{x_{k+1}}(g_s(x_1^*x_2^*\cdots x_{k-1}^*\bar{x}_k^*))) \\
&= G_{x_{n}}(G_{x_{n-1}}(\cdots G_{x_{k+1}}(g_s(x_1x_2\cdots x_k{k-1}x_{k})))) \\
&= G_{x_{n}}(G_{x_{n-1}}(\cdots G_{x_{k+1}}(G_{x_k}(G_{x_{k-1}}(\cdots G_{x_1}(s))))) \\
&= f_s(x)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={182}
